etymology.description: 車(車) (chē, "car") + 非(非) (fēi) = vehicle metaphorical meaning plus sound -> generation, lifetime
etymology.interpretation: The character 辈(輩) combines 車(車) (chē, "car") which represents progression over time or distance, with 非(非) (fēi) providing the phonetic component, to convey the idea of a generation or lifetime as a progression through time.
etymology.simplification: 车(車) (chē, "car") simplified to 车(车), retaining the original sound and meaning without affecting the interpretation.

examples.chinese: 他是我们这一辈的骄傲(他是我們這一輩的驕傲)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì wǒmen zhè yī bèi de jiāo'ào.
examples.english: He is the pride of our generation.

examples.chinese: 老人告诉我(老人告訴我)，历史是由不同辈铸就的(歷史是由不同輩鑄就的)。
examples.pinyin: Lǎorén gàosù wǒ, lìshǐ shì yóu bùtóng bèi zhùjiù de.
examples.english: The old man told me, history is forged by different generations.
